item.description: I’m Stepan, I started with automation back in 2010 as a technician in servers factory. Then, I moved to the consulting role in Hewlett Packard Enterprise. I spent in that factory for almost 7 years, I’ve learned there how to automate almost every deployment at any scale. Also, I got in touch with the platforms there. In 2018 it was about the time to move on and explore the real purpose of stuff I was implementing there.
